trans-unit.source: Registers a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*> in a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref> or set of clouds.
trans-unit.target: Registrerer en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*>i en <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref> eller et sett med skyer.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: Registration creates (or updates) all the information that is associated with a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> in a peer cloud or clouds.
trans-unit.target: Registrering oppretter (eller oppdaterer) all informasjonen som er knyttet til en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>i en node sky eller skyer.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: It is possible to have multiple PeerNameRegistration objects for the same peer name.
trans-unit.target: Det er mulig å ha flere PeerNameRegistration-objekter for det samme navnet på node.

trans-unit.source: In such a case, if the peer name is secured, each instance represents PeerNameRegistration in a different cloud.
trans-unit.target: Hvis nodenavn er sikkert, representerer hver forekomst i så fall PeerNameRegistration i en annen skyen.

trans-unit.source: However, if the peer name is not secured, it can be registered in the same cloud multiple times, providing that each registration is from a different process.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis nodenavn ikke er sikkert, registreres den i samme skyen flere ganger gir at hver registrering kommer fra en annen prosess.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny standardforekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new default instance of type <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en ny standardforekomst av typen <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration>

trans-unit.source: It does not perform peer name registration during construction.
trans-unit.target: Den utfører ikke peer name registrering under oppretting av.

trans-unit.source: After instantiating an object with this constructor, the caller should populate the appropriate fields in the instance prior to calling <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Start%2A> or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Stop%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren må fylle ut de riktige feltene i forekomsten før du kaller opp <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Start%2A>eller <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Stop%2A>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Stop%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Start%2A> etter start av et objekt med denne konstruktøren,

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"></xref> class with the specified name and port number.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"> </xref> klassen med det angitte navnet på og portnummeret.

trans-unit.source: Calling this constructor creates an instance that will be used to register all source addresses (both IPv6and IPv4) and the provided port for all clouds in which the peer is currently participating.
trans-unit.target: Kall til denne konstruktøren oppretter en forekomst som skal brukes til å registrere alle kildeadresser (begge IPv6and IPv4) og den angitte porten for alle skyer der motparten deltar for øyeblikket.

trans-unit.source: If the object is constructed successfully, the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Port%2A> are populated.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du objektet, angitt <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName%2A>og <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Port%2A>er utfylt.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Port%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the peer name is secured and was previously registered in a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Cloud%2A> the peer is currently participating in, an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis nodenavn sikres og tidligere ble registrert i en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Cloud%2A>motparten deltar for øyeblikket i en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException>forårsakes.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerToPeerException> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Cloud%2A>

trans-unit.source: This constructor only creates a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration> instance; it does not perform the registration.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren bare oppretter en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration>serverforekomsten; utfører ikke registreringen.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration>

trans-unit.source: After instantiating the registration object with this constructor and populating its fields, the application must call <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Start%2A> to perform the actual registration.
trans-unit.target: Programmet må kalle etter starte registreringen-objekt med denne konstruktøren og utfylling feltene, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Start%2A>til å utføre den faktiske registreringen.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> object to register.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> objekt for å registrere.

trans-unit.source: Integer value that specifies the port number to register.
trans-unit.target: Heltall som angir portnummeret til å registrere.

trans-unit.source: The name parameter cannot be .
trans-unit.target: Den name parameteren kan ikke være .

trans-unit.source: The specified port number is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Det angitte portnummeret er mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: Port numbers must be greater than or equal to zero and less than 65,535 (0xFFFF).
trans-unit.target: Portnumre må være større enn eller lik null, og mindre enn 65 535 (0xFFFF).

trans-unit.source: - The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> specified has already been registered from this host.
trans-unit.target: -Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> angitte er allerede registrert fra denne verten.

trans-unit.source: - The remote peer does not own the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName.Authority*> for the supplied <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: -Den eksterne datamaskinen ikke eier av <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName.Authority*>for de leverte <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> objektet.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName.Authority*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new serializable <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Starter en ny serialiserbare <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Reference to the object that holds the data needed to deserialize this instance.
trans-unit.target: Referanse til objektet som inneholder dataene som kreves for deserialisering av denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Context that provides the means for deserializing the data.
trans-unit.target: Sammenheng som lar deserialisering av dataene.

trans-unit.source: Also referred to as the source of the serialized data.
trans-unit.target: Kalles også kilden for de serialiserte dataene.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"></xref> class with the specified peer name, port number, and <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"> </xref> klassen med den angitte nodenavn portnummeret og <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calling this constructor creates an instance that will be used to register all source addresses (both IPv6 and IPv4), the provided port, and the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Cloud%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Kall til denne konstruktøren oppretter en forekomst som skal brukes til å registrere alle kilde-adresser (både IPv6 og IPv4), den angitte porten og den angitte <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Cloud%2A>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Cloud%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the object is constructed successfully, the properties are populated with the specified <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Port%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Cloud%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du objektet ble, egenskapene er fylt ut med de angitte <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName%2A> <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Port%2A>og <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Cloud%2A>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Cloud%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Port%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the cloud parameter is `null`, the name is registered using the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> shortcut, which initializes default values for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis parameteren cloud `null`, navnet er registrert ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>snarvei som initialiserer standardverdier for den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, og <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>

trans-unit.source: After instantiation, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Start%2A> method must be called to register the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.
trans-unit.target: Etter instantiering- <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Start%2A>metoden må kalles for å registrere <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> object to register.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> objekt for å registrere.

trans-unit.source: Integer value that specifies the port number to register.
trans-unit.target: Heltall som angir portnummeret til å registrere.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref> in which to register the peer name.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>du skal registrere nodenavn.

trans-unit.source: The name parameter cannot be .
trans-unit.target: Den name parameteren kan ikke være .

trans-unit.source: The specified port number is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Det angitte portnummeret er mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: Port numbers must be greater than or equal to zero and less than 65,535 (0xFFFF).
trans-unit.target: Portnumre må være større enn eller lik null, og mindre enn 65 535 (0xFFFF).

trans-unit.source: - The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> specified has already been registered from this host.
trans-unit.target: -Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> angitte er allerede registrert fra denne verten.

trans-unit.source: - The remote peer does not own the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName.Authority*> for the supplied <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: -Den eksterne datamaskinen ikke eier av <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName.Authority*>for de leverte <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> objektet.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName.Authority*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets information in a Cloud into which this <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*> object will be registered.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir informasjonen i en sky i som denne <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*>objektet skal registreres.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: An object of type <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref> that specifies the peer cloud for which this registration is defined.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt av typen <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref> som angir node skyen som er definert for denne registreringen.

trans-unit.source: This property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> by default.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> som standard.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets additional information about the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> object that will be registered with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tilleggsinformasjon den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> objektet som vil bli registrert med den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The comment that contains additional information about the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> to associate with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kommentaren som inneholder tilleggsinformasjon om den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> å knytte til den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> by default.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> som standard.

trans-unit.source: The specified string value is greater than 39 Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte strengverdien er større enn 39 Unicode-tegn.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets application-defined binary data for the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Programdefinert binære data for den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The maximum amount of Data that can be supplied is 4,096 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Maksimal mengden Data som kan angis er 4 096 byte.

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes that holds the binary data associated with the entry.
trans-unit.target: En bytematrise som inneholder de binære dataene som er knyttet til posten.

trans-unit.source: This property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> by default.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> som standard.

trans-unit.source: The specified Data is greater than 4096 bytes.
trans-unit.target: De angitte dataene er større enn 4096 byte.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources and optionally releases the managed resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressurser og eventuelt frigir forvaltet ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>Frigi ressurser både administrerte og uforvaltede; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of network endpoints for which the associated peer name is registered.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av endepunkt som tilknyttede nodenavn er registrert på nettverket.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Net> namespace, an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> represents a network endpoint as an IP address and a port number.
trans-unit.target: I de <xref:System.Net>navneområde, en <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>representerer et nettverksendepunkt som en IP-adresse og et portnummer.</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> </xref:System.Net>

trans-unit.source: For PNRP, an IP address and port value must be provided for each endpoint.
trans-unit.target: En IP-adresse og port. verdi må angis for hvert endepunkt for PNRP.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of endpoints that can be provided is ten.
trans-unit.target: Det maksimale antallet endepunkt som kan angis er ti.

trans-unit.source: Automatic address selection is used when this parameter is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Automatisk utvalg brukes når denne parameteren er `null`.

trans-unit.source: If a registration method is used that automatically selects the addresses to register, there is no method to determine theaddresses for which the peer name was registered.
trans-unit.target: Hvis registrering metoden brukes som automatisk velger adressene for å registrere, er det ingen metode for å fastslå theaddresses som nodenavn ble registrert.

trans-unit.source: That is, the EndPointCollection property will not be updated to reflect the addresses selected.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen EndPointCollection, som er ikke oppdateres for å gjenspeile adressene som er valgt.

trans-unit.source: When a peer name is registered for more than one node, each <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration> is distinct and the EndPointCollection property defined on each registration instance will be different.
trans-unit.target: Når et nodenavn er registrert for flere enn én node hver <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration>er distinkt og EndPointCollection-egenskap som er definert for hver forekomst registrering vil være forskjellig.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration>

trans-unit.source: Also, when a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName%2A> is registered into more than one <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Cloud%2A>, each registration is distinct and the collection of endpoints will usually be different for each instance.
trans-unit.target: Også når en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName%2A>er registrert i mer enn én <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Cloud%2A>hver registrering er distinkt og samlingen av endepunkt, blir vanligvis forskjellig for hver forekomst.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Cloud%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.EndPointCollection*> object that contains the network endpoints for which the associated peer name is registered.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.EndPointCollection*>objekt som inneholder tilknyttede nodenavn registreres endepunkt på nettverket.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.EndPointCollection*>

trans-unit.source: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for reference types.
trans-unit.target: Med mindre du eksplisitt angitt, er standardverdien for alle egenskaper <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> for referansetyper.

trans-unit.source: Populates a serialization information object with the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Fyller ut et objekt for serialisering informasjon med dataene som kreves for å serialisere den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Holds the serialized data associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder de serialiserte dataene som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Contains destination for the serialized stream associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder målet for serialisert dataflyt knyttet til den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the peer name specified in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*> property is registered with a specific <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref> on a host.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir om nodenavn angis i den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*>egenskap som er registrert med en bestemt <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref> på en vert.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the peer name is registered with a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Cloud*> for the peer host. If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, then the registration process can be started with <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Start*>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, nodenavn er registrert med en <> </> *> for node-vert. Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, og deretter registreringsprosessen kan startes med <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: An object that has been disposed already cannot be registered.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke registrere et objekt som allerede har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the peer name to register with a peer cloud.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir nodenavn registrere med en node sky.

trans-unit.source: A peer name can be registered for more than one node; each <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration> instance is distinct.
trans-unit.target: Et nodenavn kan registreres for flere noden. hver <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration>forekomsten er distinkt.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.EndPointCollection%2A> property associated with each corresponding <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> instance is different.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.EndPointCollection%2A>egenskapen som er knyttet til hver svarer <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>forekomsten er forskjellig.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.EndPointCollection%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, it is possible to register a peer name for more than one cloud that the node is connected to; each of these registrations is distinct.
trans-unit.target: Det er også mulig å registrere et nodenavn for mer enn én sky noden er koblet til. hvert enkelt av disse registreringer er distinkt.

trans-unit.source: The peer name's <xref:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection> will be different in each of these instances.
trans-unit.target: Nodenavnet <xref:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection>er forskjellige i hvert enkelt av disse forekomstene.</xref:System.Net.IPEndPointCollection>

trans-unit.source: An object of type <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> that contains values associated with this <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt av typen <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> som inneholder verdier som er forbundet med denne <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> for reference types.
trans-unit.target: Med mindre du eksplisitt angitt, er standardverdien for alle egenskaper <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> for referansetyper.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [TCP/IP](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink?LinkID=98458) port number used by the peer being registered into the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den [TCP/IP](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink?LinkID=98458) portnummer motparten registreres i den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The default port is used by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Start%2A> method only when no endpoints are specified.
trans-unit.target: Standardporten brukes av den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Start%2A>metoden bare når ingen endepunkter er angitt.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: An integer value indicating the TCP port number of the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>.
trans-unit.target: En heltallsverdi som angir TCP-porten antall <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>.</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for this property is zero (0).
trans-unit.target: Med mindre du eksplisitt angitt, er standardverdien for denne egenskapen null (0).

trans-unit.source: The specified port value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte port-verdien er mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: Port numbers must be greater than or equal to zero and less than 65,535 (0xFFFF).
trans-unit.target: Portnumre må være større enn eller lik null, og mindre enn 65 535 (0xFFFF).

trans-unit.source: Registers the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*> into the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Cloud*>.
trans-unit.target: Registrerer den <> </> *> til den <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.EndPointCollection*> is specified, automatic address selection is used with the port value specified by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Port*> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen <> </> *> er angitt, automatisk utvalg brukes med portverdi som er angitt av den <> </> *> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The method registers the peer name specified in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName%2A> property with all source addresses and the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Port%2A> specified in the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Metoden registrerer nodenavn som er angitt i den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName%2A>egenskapen med alle kilde-adresser og <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Port%2A>angitt i konstruktøren.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Port%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default port is used by this method only when no endpoints are specified.
trans-unit.target: Standardporten brukes av denne metoden bare når ingen endepunkter er angitt.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Cloud%2A> property is `null`, this method registers the peer name specified in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName%2A> property using the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> field, which initializes default values for the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Cloud%2A>egenskapen `null`, denne metoden registrerer nodenavn som er angitt i den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName%2A>ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available>-feltet initialiserer standardverdier for den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A>, og <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.ScopeId%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Name%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud.Available> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Cloud%2A>

trans-unit.source: After a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration> object has been started, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Stop%2A> method is used to stop it.
trans-unit.target: Etter en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration>objektet er startet, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Stop%2A>metoden brukes til å stoppe den.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Stop%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration>

trans-unit.source: To update a registration, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Update%2A> method must be used.
trans-unit.target: Å oppdatere en registrering av <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Update%2A>-metoden må brukes.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*>er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: This object had Dispose() called on it previously.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet har Dispose() kalles for den tidligere.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> specified has already been registered.
trans-unit.target: -Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> angitte er allerede registrert.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Update*> method must be used to update a registration. - The remote peer does not own the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName.Authority*> for the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: Den <> </> *> metoden må brukes til å oppdatere en registrering. -Den eksterne datamaskinen ikke eier av <> </> *> for den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> angitt.

trans-unit.source: - Either the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"></xref> or the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.Data*> is not specified; at least one needs to be provided. - The message or data elements are invalid. Or, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.UseAutoEndPointSelection*> is not set and no data blob or <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -Enten den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName"> </xref> eller <> </> *> er ikke angitt; minst én må angis. -Melding eller data elementer er ugyldig. Eller <> </> *> er ikke angitt og ingen data blob eller <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>er angitt.</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: Unregisters the peer name specified in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*> property from all the clouds in which it was registered.
trans-unit.target: Avregistrerer nodenavn som er angitt i den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*>egenskapen fra alle skyer den ble registrert.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: After the registration process has been stopped, the registration object's state is equal to the state directly after being constructed by the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: Når registreringen er stoppet, er registrering objektets tilstanden lik tilstanden rett etter opprettet av Standardkonstruktøren.

trans-unit.source: In this state, all of its properties are assumed to have no value.
trans-unit.target: Alle egenskapene antas har ingen verdi i denne tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Start%2A> method may be used to restart it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Start%2A>Metoden kan brukes til å starte det.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is possible to have multiple registration objects for the same peer name.
trans-unit.target: Det er mulig å ha flere objekter for registrering for node-navnet.

trans-unit.source: In such a case, if the peer name is secured, each instance will represent a registration in a different PNRP cloud.
trans-unit.target: I slike tilfeller Hvis nodenavn er sikkert, vil hver forekomst representere en registrering i en annen PNRP skyen.

trans-unit.source: However, if the peer name is not secured, it can be registered in the same cloud multiple times.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid Hvis nodenavn ikke er sikret, kan være registrert i den samme skyen flere ganger.

trans-unit.source: If this instance is already stopped, calling this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne forekomsten er allerede stoppet, har kaller denne metoden ingen virkning.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*> property has not yet been registered. This occurs when a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"></xref> object is constructed using the empty constructor. The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*> property must be populated in this instance prior to calling <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Start*>.
trans-unit.target: Den <> </> *> egenskapen er ikke registrert ennå. Dette skjer når en <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"> </xref> -objektet er konstruert med tom konstruktøren. Den <> </> *> egenskapen må være fylt ut i denne forekomsten før du kaller <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Start*>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Start*>

trans-unit.source: This object had Dispose() called on it previously.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet har Dispose() kalles for den tidligere.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable"></xref> interface and returns the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable"> </xref> grensesnittet og returnerer dataene som kreves for å serialisere den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Holds the serialized data associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder de serialiserte dataene som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Contains the destination for the serialized stream associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder målet for serialisert dataflyt knyttet til den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Updates the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"></xref> for a node registered with a specific <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oppdateringer av <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration"> </xref> for en node som er registrert med en bestemt <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Update is performed using the information specified in the properties.
trans-unit.target: Oppdatering utføres ved hjelp av informasjonen som er angitt i Egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: All information registered in cloud(s) for this <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> prior to the call is completely discarded.
trans-unit.target: All informasjon som er registrert i cloud(s) for dette <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>før kallet forkastes fullstendig.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: The new data is not combined with the existing registration.
trans-unit.target: De nye dataene kombineres ikke med den eksisterende registreringen.

trans-unit.source: To update a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration>, first update the properties on this instance and then call this method.
trans-unit.target: Å oppdatere en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration>, Oppdater først egenskapene i denne forekomsten og kalle denne metoden.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration>

trans-unit.source: After a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord> is registered, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName%2A> property cannot be updated.
trans-unit.target: Etter en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord>er registrert i <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName%2A>egenskapen kan ikke oppdateres.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.PeerName%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord>

trans-unit.source: All other fields in the record may be updated.
trans-unit.target: Alle feltene i oppføringen oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*>er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*> property has not yet been registered. The Update method cannot be called until the peer name specified in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*> property is registered in one or more clouds.
trans-unit.target: -Den <> </> *> egenskapen er ikke registrert ennå. Update-metoden kan ikke kalles før nodenavn angitt i den <> </> *> egenskapen er registrert i én eller flere skyer.

trans-unit.source: - The peer name specified in the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*> property has changed since the corresponding <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> was registered.
trans-unit.target: -Node-navnet som er angitt i den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*>egenskapen er endret siden den tilsvarende <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> ble registrert.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.PeerName*>

trans-unit.source: An object that has been disposed cannot be registered.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke registrere et objekt som har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"></xref> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord"> </xref> er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to use automatic endpoint selection when traversing a peer mesh or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Cloud*>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om du vil bruke automatisk sluttpunktet utvalget når traversering node nettet eller <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Cloud*>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Cloud*>

trans-unit.source: When auto endpoint selection is used (this property is set to `true`) with no endpoint information specified prior to the start of a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration>, the system chooses individual endpoints and publishes them with the associated peer name into all available clouds.
trans-unit.target: Når endpoint Autovalg brukes (denne egenskapen er satt til `true`) med ingen endepunktinformasjon angitt før starten av en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration>, systemet velger individuelle sluttpunkt og publiseres dem med tilknyttede nodenavn til alle tilgjengelige skyer.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration>

trans-unit.source: If the port is not specified, auto selection chooses zero as the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Port%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis porten ikke er angitt, velger Autovalg null som <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Port%2A>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.Port%2A>

trans-unit.source: When set to `false`, auto selection as described above is not performed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du velger `false`, utføres ikke Autovalg som beskrevet ovenfor.

trans-unit.source: This enables the registration process to publish a peer name along with a data blob (as specified by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.Data%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: Dette aktiverer registreringsprosessen å publisere et nodenavn sammen med et data-blob (som angitt av den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.Data%2A>egenskapen).</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecord.Data%2A>

trans-unit.source: No endpoints are associated with the name.
trans-unit.target: Ingen endepunkt er knyttet til navnet.

trans-unit.source: If a registration method is used that automatically selects the addresses to register, there is no method to determine what addresses for which the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> object was registered.
trans-unit.target: Hvis registrering metoden brukes som automatisk velger adressene for å registrere, vises ingen metode for å finne ut hva adresser som den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>objektet ble registrert.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>

trans-unit.source: That is, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.EndPointCollection%2A> property will not be updated to reflect the addresses selected.
trans-unit.target: Det vil si den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.EndPointCollection%2A>egenskapen vil ikke bli oppdatert for å gjenspeile adressene som er valgt.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRegistration.EndPointCollection%2A>

trans-unit.source: Updating this property after peer name registration has started has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Oppdatering av denne egenskapen etter registrering av peer name har startet, har ingen virkning.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if automatic endpoint selection is to be used; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if some other method will be used to determine an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>Hvis automatisk endpoint utvalg som skal brukes; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis en annen metode som skal brukes til å finne et sluttpunkt.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
